statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={4.8} , \displaystyle{b}={6.8}, \displaystyle{c}={9.8}, and \displaystyle{d}={12.1}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={9.1}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
